name: PEPi
description: $PEPi V2 is a new kind of digital token, leveraging the novel ERC-20i format that combines NFTs and memecoins, now with improved inscription visuals since the relaunch on 4/24/24. Each level of token accumulation resembles a seed that generates unique 32x32 dynamic images of Pepe, stored on-chain. The more you have, the more it grows. You need 56 $PEPi to achieve Pepe adulthood, and with a total max supply of 13,370, only 238 fully mature Pepe can ever exist.
